Database

Class GeomObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database.GeomObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Line, Point, Polygon

    public abstract class GeomObject
extends java.lang.Object
    The GeoObject abstract class represents a geometric object that could be a point, a line, or a polygon
    Version:
    4/1/2018
    Author:
    DB Team
